title: 2 Level 4 BD/2.5 BA w/W&D, Dishwasher, Parking, VIEWS - North Beach
posting_body: ['974 Greenwich Street - Spacious View Condo in North Beach', 'Please watch the YouTube video of this unit before inquiring:', '<URL>', 'NOTE- NO VIRTUAL SHOWINGS.', 'ANYONE INTERESTED MUST BE PHYSICALLY PRESENT WITH FULL GROUP FOR IN-PERSON VIEWINGS.', 'THANK YOU!', 'DESCRIPTION:', 'Spacious 4 bed, 2.5 bath condo on two levels', 'Wood style flooring throughout', 'Entry level features half bath, open kitchen, spacious living & dining area with decorative fireplace, and balcony with sweeping views of the Bay', 'Rustic, open style kitchen features bar overhang perfect for additional bar stool seating, ample cabinet and counter space, marble style counters, and high-end stainless steel appliances including large 4-burner gas Viking cooktop, oven and hood, dishwasher, refrigerator, and Viking oven/microwave', 'Upstairs offers four bedrooms (all with windows and small closets) – one features attached balcony and gorgeous views.', 'Also on this level is a stacked washer & dryer and two full bathrooms – one with shower over tub and the other with walk in shower and large vanities for storage', 'Single parking space available for $300/month or tandem space (2 cars) for $450/month', 'LOCATION:', 'Located in great neighborhood close to both the heart of North Beach and Russian Hill.', 'Five minute walk to Washington Square Park and the center of North Beach with lots of wonderful dining options – Tony’s Pizza, gorgeous Park Tavern, Original Joes, Chubby Noodle, Acquolina, and more', 'Ten minute walk to George Sterling Park with stunning views of the city, tennis and basketball courts', 'Fifteen minute walk to Prime Polk Street with some of the city’s best restaurants, cafes, and nightlife', 'Ten minute walk to multiple muni lines; Fifteen minute commute downtown', '8 minute walk to Trader Joes', 'OTHER DETAILS:', 'No smoking', 'Owner pays for trash service – tenant responsible for water, gas, and electricity', 'Sorry, no pets', 'Minimum lease term is 12 months', 'Deposit is 1.5x monthly rent', 'RENTAL CRITERIA:', 'Verifiable monthly gross income equivalent to 3x monthly rent', 'Minimum credit score of 700', 'Verified & established employment history', 'Positive rental reference', 'For more information', 'Contact Lisa at', 'show contact info', 'Compass', 'Lic#02094548', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by a tenant of their rights under the Rent Ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
